statements: SELECT * FROM student_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, feedback_text FROM student_feedback WHERE instructor_id = 101;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id = 202 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_feedback WHERE course_id = 303 AND rating < 4 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT instructor_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM student_feedback GROUP BY instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM student_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, instructor_id FROM student_feedback WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM student_feedback GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM student_feedback WHERE course_id = 101 OR instructor_id = 201 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC, instructor_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM student_feedback;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, course_id FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, feedback FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT instructor_name, evaluation FROM instructors ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_id FROM students WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT instructor_name, course_id, evaluation FROM instructors WHERE course_id = 201 ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, feedback FROM students JOIN instructors ON students.course_id = instructors.course_id WHERE students.student_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT course_id FROM students WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM student_feedback;
SELECT feedback, student_id, course_id FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT rating, course_id, comment FROM course_evaluation WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT instructor_id, feedback FROM instructor_feedback ORDER BY instructor_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, instructor_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM course_evaluation GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT * FROM student_feedback;
SELECT course_id, feedback FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT course_id, instructor_id, rating FROM course_evaluation WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM instructor_feedback ORDER BY instructor_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, instructor_id FROM course_evaluation JOIN student_feedback ON course_evaluation.course_id = student_feedback.course_id;
SELECT * FROM student_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT overall_rating, content_rating FROM course_evaluation WHERE evaluation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM instructor_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, overall_rating, instructor_rating FROM course_rating WHERE content_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM student_feedback;
SELECT course_id, feedback_text FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM student_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, instructor_id, feedback_text FROM student_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, course_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(overall_rating), MAX(content_rating), MIN(instructor_rating) FROM course_evaluation WHERE evaluation_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructors;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback;
SELECT course_id, evaluation_score, evaluation_date FROM evaluations;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_email, COUNT(*) AS Total_Students FROM students GROUP BY student_name, student_email;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses INNER JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, feedback_text FROM students JOIN feedback ON students.student_id = feedback.student_id JOIN courses ON feedback.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT course_name, AVG(evaluation_score) AS Average_Score FROM courses LEFT JOIN evaluations ON courses.course_id = evaluations.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY Average_Score DESC;
